resources.string: Discover the cosmos! Each day a different image or photograph of our fascinating universe is featured, along with a brief explanation written by a professional astronomer.
You don\'t have an API key registered, so your usage can\'t be tracked! Click the button below to register for a key.
You are currently using the demo key for the NASA API - this means you have significantly less usage per hour than a regular key. Click the button below to register for a full key.
You haven\'t used your API key yet today! Open a few APOD images and come back to check up.
